ygData.subject: Recovering Rodimus

Subject: Recovering Rodimus
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=167039986; y=0FOBP6NKe2Zvki75x6s_4NzrzFMVWaBimHSMtYdP0BsaFsp4NJU

From what Kenzo had told him, Tucson could now put two and two together and=
 now realized that his restoration abilities along with his skills as a war=
rior, would be needed more than ever.  To him Restoration was more than jus=
t restoring artifacts, making them appear and work like new, it was also ab=
out restoring old programming and recovery of important data.  He did not k=
now the extent of the corruption upon which was placed on Rodimus but he kn=
ew he couldn't just throw in the towel on his leader.  Autobots stuck toget=
her, and through thick and thin, he'd keep his pledge to never abandon his =
fellow Autobots.  He also realized that if he was going to get anywhere, he=
'd have to do it himself.  

"On second thought, I think I'll go this one a=
lone.  Don't wait up for me, I don't think I'll be back too soon."

He bids=
 Kenzo good bye and walks out of the room.  

"Oh before I forget, have the=
 CR chamber prepared for Rodimus.  He'll need it more than me."  

He was d=
ead set on recovering his leader.  And this time, nothing and no one would =
get in his way of achieving his mission.  He sends one final message to Lor=
d Perseus.

"Lord Perseus, it's come to my attention that my leader, Rodimu=
s Prime, has been abducted and altered severely.  This puts the Matrix of L=
eadership at a grave Risk, but most of all, his spark, which I believe is t=
oo precious to waste for evil purposes.  I can not abandon my leader, not e=
ven in his corruptive state.  I hereby announce that I am on route to locat=
ing my leader, and I DO intend to BRING HIM BACK.  Hopefully, the damage ca=
n be reversed.  If not, there is question of the well being of the Matrix. =
 I must recover it, perhaps not for my own personal gain, but for the benef=
it of Autobot kind.  It's too precious to lose to the hands of those who th=
irst for power and greed.  I swear by Primus's name, I will return, but my =
return may not be a fast one.  May Primus guide you as he guides me.  This =
is Tucson, signing off. I will report to you again, once I know more of the=
 condition of my leader."

He signs off, gets off the ship, and transforms =
into SUV mode, hoping to find Rodimus via his sonar systems.

Tag: Kraftlos=
 and Cyclonus.
